Title: YouTube API Class & Server Control for ASP.NET 4.0
Description:
This project have option to use YouTube API easily into your asp.net application using the simple dll file.

Also you can display YouTube Videos in your website using Server Control simply.

.

This project have option to use YouTube API easily into your asp.net application using the simple dll file.

Also you can display YouTube Videos in your website using Server Control simply.

You can find binary dll files under :- Demo\bin\ folder

Demo : http://demo.svinn.com/YouTube/Default.aspx

Hosting : http://ghosting.in

This script contains powerful YouTube API & Server Video Control.

Features :
Embed Code
Short Url
Video Thumbnals
Title & Description of Video
Video Code
Customized YouTube Video's Width & Height

Systems for :
Youtube API
Video Server Control
